Text:
We are YieldMore Services,
Web Consulting Agency,
Based in Chennai, India.

Newly established, we provide web development services to Conscious Businesses, offering them to be a part of our "Yield More Love" Network. We work primarily in our own platform "Amadeus CMS" a powerful tool for programming any html template found online. We can extend our core team / train your staff / volunteers as required.
Our unique database-less paradigm shift platform means that your website, content, programming and graphics are all stored neatly organized folders.
Heading: Track your content

Text: Since we are built on top of modern web technologies like html5 and php, the sky truly is the limit on whats possible to extend in your website.
Heading: Anything is Possible

Text: Themes take a couple of hours to convert and setup and you can pay designers for great themes as is your wont. Our's is by Canvas.
Heading: Great Themes

Text: We can optimize html themes based on lighthouse reports and our own framework is hardly 100Kb (yes kilo bytes) and loads in under one tenth of a second.
Heading: Blazing Fast

Text: We are Amadeus Consultants - yada yada ya.
